comments.creator: ancestor.ak@gmail.com
comments.raw_text:
Works ok with other text fields.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Click in the search field, clear it if it's not empty.
2. Press Up or Down Arrow.

Results: the autocomplete list doesn't pop up.

Regression between BonEcho/2.0a1_2006050803 and BonEcho/2.0a2_2006050905

http://tinderbox.mozilla.org/bonsai/cvsquery.cgi?treeid=default&module=all&branch=MOZILLA_1_8_BRANCH&branchtype=match&dir=&file=&filetype=match&who=&whotype=match&sortby=Date&hours=2&date=explicit&mindate=2006-05-08+03%3A15%3A00+&maxdate=2006-05-09+04%3A37%3A41&cvsroot=%2Fcvsroot
comments.text:
Works ok with other text fields.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Click in the search field, clear it if it's not empty.
2. Press Up or Down Arrow.

Results: the autocomplete list doesn't pop up.

Regression between BonEcho/2.0a1_2006050803 and BonEcho/2.0a2_2006050905

http://tinderbox.mozilla.org/bonsai/cvsquery.cgi?treeid=default&module=all&branch=MOZILLA_1_8_BRANCH&branchtype=match&dir=&file=&filetype=match&who=&whotype=match&sortby=Date&hours=2&date=explicit&mindate=2006-05-08+03%3A15%3A00+&maxdate=2006-05-09+04%3A37%3A41&cvsroot=%2Fcvsroot

comments.creator: gavin.sharp@gmail.com
comments.raw_text: This is due to the suggest changes, almost undoubtedly.
comments.text: This is due to the suggest changes, almost undoubtedly.
comments.author: gavin.sharp@gmail.com

comments.raw_text: So, this is because you're using an engine that provides its own autocomplete results, as opposed to local search history.  I don't know offhand if this is easily fixable, or if its worth fixing.
comments.creator: mconnor@mozilla.com
comments.author: mconnor@mozilla.com
comments.text: So, this is because you're using an engine that provides its own autocomplete results, as opposed to local search history.  I don't know offhand if this is easily fixable, or if its worth fixing.

comments.author: ancestor.ak@gmail.com
comments.text: Fixed by the patch in bug 338061.
comments.raw_text: Fixed by the patch in bug 338061.
